source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GREETING_AMELIANCE_000_000<tab>Hello there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Have you come with a delivery today, or did you perhaps care for a spot of tea?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GREETING_AMELIANCE_000_000<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Bonsoir)) ((Bonjour)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Bonjour)) ((Bonsoir)) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. M'apportez-vous ce que je vous avais demandé<var 1D /var>? Ou bien êtes-vous ici pour boire un délicieux thé avec moi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GREETING_AMELIANCE_000_001<tab>Ah, 'tis good to see you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I trust the procurement of the various odds and ends for the study abroad program proceeds apace? I am beside myself with anticipation to see what wonders you will bring!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GREETING_AMELIANCE_000_001<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, vous tombez bien<var 1D /var>! Comment avancent la fabrication du <var 1A 02 /var>matériel magique<var 1A 01 /var> et la pêche aux crapauds pour nos étudiants étrangers<var 1D /var>? J'ai si hâte de voir ce que vous m'apporterez<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GREETING_AMELIANCE_000_002<tab>Thank you for your continued support as always, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. As I know all too well from my time as a student, 'tis nigh impossible to concentrate on an empty stomachーhence why I've a mind to keep some aetherothermal lunch boxes at hand, if I could trouble you with the task of procuring them?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GREETING_AMELIANCE_000_002<tab>Je suis ravie de vous voir, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. J'étais justement en train de me dire que les repas peuvent être une source de soucis pour les étudiants étrangers, et j'aimerais les aider. Pourriez-vous me fabriquer quelques <var 1A 02 /var>boîtes à déjeuner magiques<var 1A 01 /var>, s'il vous plaît<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GREETING_AMELIANCE_000_003<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>ーseeing you always puts me at ease. If you're ever in need of a respite, you are always welcome here. As we discussed earlier, I would like as many mammets as you can prepare to aid students having trouble with magicks.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GREETING_AMELIANCE_000_003<tab>Oh, quel plaisir de vous voir, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Dites, j'aurais besoin de <var 1A 02 /var>poupées d'en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment<var 1A 01 /var> pour les étudiants qui ont des difficultés à maîtriser la magie. Ah, mais ne vous surmenez pas, d'accord<var 1D /var>? Vous êtes toujours l<var 08 E905 ((a)) ((e)) /var> bienvenu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> chez moi si vous souhaitez vous reposer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GREETING_AMELIANCE_000_004<tab>Welcome, welcome! I was just thinking of you. You <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> stop by when you can, won't you? Even if it's just for a spot of tea, seeing that you are safe and sound puts my heart at ease.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GREETING_AMELIANCE_000_004<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Bonsoir)) ((Bonjour)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Bonjour)) ((Bonsoir)) /var>)) /var> <var 08 E905 ((chère amie)) ((cher ami)) /var><var 1D /var>! Je me demandais justement quand j'allais vous revoir<var 1D /var>! Votre présence est toujours la bienvenue ici, vous savez.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TOPMENU_000_000<tab>What will you do?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TOPMENU_000_000<tab>Que voulez-vous faire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TOPMENU_000_001<tab>Make a delivery (<var 20 E803 /var> remaining).
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TOPMENU_000_001<tab>Livrer une commande spéciale (<var 20 E803 /var> livraison<var 08 E2E80302 (()) ((s)) /var> possible<var 08 E2E80302 (()) ((s)) /var>)

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TOPMENU_000_002<tab>Cast glamour on Ameliance.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TOPMENU_000_002<tab>Appliquer un mirage sur Ameliance

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TOPMENU_000_003<tab>Learn about custom deliveries.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TOPMENU_000_003<tab>Demander plus d'in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions sur les commandes spéciales

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TOPMENU_000_004<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TOPMENU_000_004<tab>Annuler

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_000_000<tab>What would you learn more about?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_000_000<tab>Sur quoi vous renseignez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_001_000<tab>Satisfaction level.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_001_000<tab>La sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_007_000<tab>Delivery requirements and rewards.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_007_000<tab>Les conditions à remplir et les récompenses

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_002_000<tab>Procuring collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_002_000<tab>L'obtention des objets à livrer

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_003_000<tab>Acquiring materials.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_003_000<tab>L'obtention de matériaux d'artisanat

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_004_000<tab>Increasing the value of crafted collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_004_000<tab>La façon d'augmenter la valeur de collection d'un objet (artisans)

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_005_000<tab>Increasing the value of gathered collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_005_000<tab>La façon d'augmenter la valeur de collection d'un objet (mineurs et botanistes)

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_006_000<tab>Increasing the value of fish.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_006_000<tab>La façon d'augmenter la valeur de collection d'un objet (pêcheurs)

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_CANCEL<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDEMENU_CANCEL<tab>Rien en particulier

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_001_000<tab>With each successful delivery, Ameliance will come to trust you more and more, leading her to task you with assignments of greater importance.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_001_000<tab>Plus vous livrerez d'objets à Ameliance, plus elle sera satisfaite de vos services.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_001_001<tab>This will be displayed in the form of a gauge atop the Custom Deliveries list. Fill this gauge to the maximum, and Ameliance's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>─as represented by little golden hearts─will increase.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_001_001<tab>Son niveau de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion s'exprime à travers une jauge en haut de la fenêtre des livraisons. Lorsque cette jauge est pleine, vous gagnez un rang. Le rang atteint est symbolisé par des icones en forme de cœur sous la jauge de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_001_002<tab>Upon reaching a new <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, you will have the opportunity to learn more about Ameliance and her efforts to further establish the study abroad program at the Studium.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_001_002<tab>Ameliance vous proposera de vivre de nouvelles aventures au fur et à mesure que votre niveau augmentera.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_007_000<tab>In order to deliver an item, you must be its corresponding class and level 80 or above.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_007_000<tab>Ameliance demande des objets différents en fonction de la classe de votre personnage. De plus, elle n'accepte vos livraisons qu'une fois que vous avez atteint le niveau 80.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_007_001<tab>If you are level 89 or below, you will be awarded experience points instead of the level 90 scrips reward.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_007_001<tab>En dessous du niveau 90, vous recevez en récompense de vos livraisons des points d'expérience à la place des assignats mauves normalement octroyés.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_002_000<tab>Should you find yourself unsure as to how to procure a particular item, subcommands and item descriptions can point you in the right direction.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_002_000<tab>Consultez le sous-menu d'un objet lorsque vous ne savez pas comment le fabriquer ou vous le procurer, vous y trouverez les in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions dont vous avez besoin.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_002_001<tab>For Disciple of the Hand items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Crafting Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand with the list selected will bring up the crafting log and the recipe for the item in question.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_002_001<tab>Les artisans peuvent choisir l'option “Chercher la recette” pour ouvrir le carnet d'artisanat à la page de l'objet qui les intéresse et savoir de quels matériaux ils auront besoin.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_002_002<tab>Likewise, for Disciple of the Land items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Gathering Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the gathering log.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_002_002<tab>Les mineurs et les botanistes devront choisir “Chercher le mode de récolte” pour accéder à leur carnet de récolte et savoir où commencer leurs recherches.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_002_003<tab>For knowledge on fish and fishing holes, refer to the item descriptions displayed when the list is selected.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_002_003<tab>Les pêcheurs pourront quant à eux consulter la description de la créature recherchée pour savoir dans quelles eaux jeter leur ligne.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_002_004<tab>The items sought by Ameliance fall into three categories: crafted items (obtainable by Disciples of the Hand), gathered items (obtainable by Disciples of the Land), and fish. Furthermore, Ameliance deals only in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_002_004<tab>Tous les objets, poissons et fruits de mer remis à Ameliance doivent être collectionnables, qu'ils aient été fabriqués par un artisan, récoltés par un mineur ou un botaniste, ou ferrés par un pêcheur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_003_000<tab>Materials necessary to craft the collectables Ameliance seeks may be purchased from Synnove in the Agora.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_003_000<tab>Les artisans pourront se procurer les matériaux nécessaires pour toute confection auprès de Synnove, qui se trouve à l'Agora, dans Vieille Sharlayan.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_004_000<tab>The collectability of crafted items is directly related to their quality. Spare no effort in ensuring that the items you craft are of the highest possible quality, and you will be rewarded accordingly.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_004_000<tab>La valeur de collection d'un objet augmente lorsque l'artisan qui le fabrique veille à améliorer sa qualité au moment de sa confection.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_004_002<tab>The <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Inner Quiet<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> status, granted each time you successfully increase quality, will serve you particularly well.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_004_002<tab>Vous obtenez <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Calme intérieur<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> lorsque vous parvenez à améliorer la qualité d'un objet. Cet effet accroît l'efficacité des actions qui augmentent la qualité.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_004_003<tab>Accumlate as many stacks of the status as you can, then put the final flourish on your masterpiece with <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Byregot's Blessing<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_004_003<tab>Accumulez-le autant que possible et apportez la touche finale grâce à la <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Bénédiction de Byregot<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> pour voir la qualité monter en flèche avant de terminer l'objet<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_004_004<tab>There are a host of other actions that can serve to further enhance the quality of items you craft. Once you've mastered the fundamentals, you are encouraged to experiment with varied approaches until you find your preferred crafting approach.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_004_004<tab>De multiples actions permettent d'améliorer la qualité de vos fa<var 16 /var>bri<var 16 /var>ca<var 16 /var>tions. Testez différentes méthodes pour trouver celle qui vous convient le mieux.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_005_000<tab>Before gathering a collectable item, you must increase its collectability.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_005_000<tab>Lorsque vous tentez de récolter un objet collectionnable, une fenêtre spéciale s'affiche. Vous pouvez alors augmenter sa valeur de collection avant de le récolter en utilisant des actions spécifiques.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_005_001<tab>One technique miners and botanists may employ to raise collectability is the use of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Scrutiny<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Scour<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Try executing this combination a few times before gathering the item.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_005_001<tab>Les mineurs et les botanistes peuvent utiliser <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Inspection rigoureuse<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, suivie de <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Sélection<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Essayez d'enchaîner cette combinaison lorsque vous essayez de récolter un objet collectionnable.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_005_002<tab>Gatherers seeking to procure items with higher collectability must be certain to equip gear with higher <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gathering<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> ratings, as these attributes influence the effectiveness of actions that raise collectability.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_005_002<tab>En outre, vos ca<var 16 /var>rac<var 16 /var>té<var 16 /var>ris<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ques de <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Collecte<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> et de <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Savoir-faire<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> augmentent l'effet de ces actions. Maximisez-les donc afin d'obtenir des objets à valeur de collection plus élevée.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_005_003<tab>Of course, these actions cannot be used to their full potential without sufficient <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>GP<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. A healthy balance of all three attributes is essential to make the most of your gathering.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_005_003<tab>Enfin, si votre méthode n'est pas en faute, mais que vous manquez de points de récolte (PR), munissez-vous de pièces d'équipement qui vous en procurent.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_006_000<tab>The collectability value of fish follows a simple rule─the bigger, the better.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_006_000<tab>La valeur de collection dépend directement de la taille du poisson livré.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_006_001<tab>Upon arriving at the fishing hole where your desired quarry resides, use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Collect<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> action, then begin fishing.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_006_001<tab>Seuls les poissons pêchés après avoir activé l'action <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Gant de col<var 16 /var>lec<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>neur<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> seront acceptés.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_006_002<tab>From there, using <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Patience II<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> followed by effective hooking actions will increase your chances of reeling in a big one.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_006_002<tab>Avoir recours à <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Patience II<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> avant d'utiliser les actions de pêche adéquates devrait vous permettre de ferrer de grosses prises.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_006_003<tab>Should you still find yourself catching only small fry, try outfitting yourself with better equipment to raise your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_GUIDE_006_003<tab>Si vous considérez encore que c'est du menu fretin, munissez-vous de pièces d'équipement qui améliorent votre <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Savoir-faire<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_000<tab>The items sought by Ameliance fall into three categories: crafted items (obtainable by Disciples of the Hand), gathered items (obtainable by Disciples of the Land), and fish. Furthermore, Ameliance deals only in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_000<tab>Les commandes que vous pouvez remettre à Ameliance sont réparties en <var 48 F201F6 /var><var 49 F201F7 /var>trois catégories<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><var 1D /var>: les objets fabriqués par les artisans, les objets récoltés par les mineurs et les botanistes, et les poissons et fruits de mer glanés par les pêcheurs.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_008<tab>In order to deliver an item, you must be its corresponding class and level 80 or above.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_008<tab>L'objet que vous apportez à Ameliance doit être collectionnable, et vous devez être au minimum niveau 80 pour le lui livrer.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_009<tab>If you are level 89 or below, you will be awarded experience points instead of the level 90 scrips reward.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_009<tab>Si vous n'êtes pas au niveau 90 lors de la livraison, vous recevrez des points d'expérience à la place des assignats blancs octroyés normalement.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_001<tab>Information on how to find individual items may be found in the following manner.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_001<tab>La recette ou le mode de récolte des objets qu'Ameliance recherche peut être consulté de la façon suivante<var 1D /var>:

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_002<tab>For Disciple of the Hand items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Crafting Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand with the list selected will bring up the crafting log and the recipe for the item in question.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_002<tab>Les artisans peuvent choisir l'option “Chercher la recette” pour ouvrir le carnet d'artisanat à la page de l'objet qui les intéresse et savoir de quels matériaux ils auront besoin.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_003<tab>Materials necessary to craft the collectables Ameliance seeks may be purchased from Synnove in the Agora.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_003<tab>Les artisans pourront se procurer les matériaux nécessaires pour toute confection auprès de Synnove, qui se trouve à l'Agora, dans Vieille Sharlayan.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_004<tab>Likewise, for Disciple of the Land items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Gathering Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the gathering log.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_004<tab>Les mineurs et les botanistes devront choisir “Chercher le mode de récolte” pour accéder à leur carnet de récolte et savoir où commencer leurs recherches.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_005<tab>For knowledge on fish and fishing holes, refer to the item descriptions displayed when the list is selected.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_005<tab>Les pêcheurs pourront quant à eux consulter la description de la créature recherchée pour savoir dans quelles eaux jeter leur ligne.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_006<tab>The higher an item's collectability, the greater the reward you will earn from Ameliance upon successful delivery.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_006<tab>Plus la valeur de collection de ces objets sera élevée, plus vous recevrez de récompenses.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_007<tab>To learn more about collectables and how to increase collectability, speak with Ameliance and select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Learn about custom deliveries<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_000_007<tab>Pour savoir comment augmenter la valeur de collection d'un objet, il vous suffit de parler à Ameliance et de choisir l'option “Demander plus d'in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions sur les commandes spéciales”. Votre amie se fera un plaisir de vous répondre.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_001_000<tab>In making your first successful delivery, you have begun to earn Ameliance's trust.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_001_000<tab>Plus vous livrerez de commandes spéciales à Ameliance, plus elle sera satisfaite de vos services.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_001_001<tab>With each successful delivery, Ameliance will grow more and more satisfied with your efforts. Fill the gauge completely and Ameliance's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will increase, giving you the opportunity to learn more about your new business partner.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_001_001<tab>Lorsque la jauge de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion sera pleine, votre rang augmentera et Ameliance vous proposera de nouveaux contrats.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_001_002<tab>You can make up to six deliveries in a given week. Deliver the items Ameliance needs, and deliver them often to win the trust and praise of your new business partner!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_TUTORIAL_001_002<tab>Attention cependant, car vous ne pourrez lui remettre que 6 objets par semaine. N'hésitez pas à atteindre cette limite, si vous voulez voir votre rang de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion augmenter le plus vite possible.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_WEEKLYLIMIT_000_000<tab>You have reached the weekly limit for deliveries. You may begin again starting <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_WEEKLYLIMIT_000_000Vous ne pouvez pas remettre plus d'objets à Ameliance cette semaine.
La limite hebdomadaire est réinitialisée tous les à )) 01 /var>h (temps réel).

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_001_000<tab>Students will need the finest writing utensils for not only taking notes on lectures, but transcribing ritual procedures and jotting down spells. The greater the aetherial conductivity of the instrument, the more conducive it will be to their studies.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_001_000<tab>Les étudiants de l'académie de magie doivent non seulement prendre des notes pendant leurs cours, mais également recopier diligemment d'innombrables sorts et formules. Ils ont donc besoin de matériel d'écriture solide, fortement chargé en énergie éthérée.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_001_001<tab>Students of the magical arts require an appropriate foci through which to hone their skillsーwhether it's an array of nouliths, a planisphere, cane, or magical concoction, there are numerous optionsーassuming the quality is satisfactory. What have you brought for me today, pray tell?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_001_001<tab>Pour bien étudier la magie, un bon matériel est essentiel. Il existe quantité de planisphères, d'armes d'élé<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>lis<var 16 /var>tes, d'armes de sage ou encore de concoctions magiques... J'ai hâte de voir ce que vous avez fabriqué<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_001_002<tab>As a Sharlayan, I am all too aware of our propensity to prioritize nutrition over flavor in our cuisine, but thanks to interactions with students from abroad, no small few Sharlayans have developed an interest in the cooking of other cultures. If you could procure lunch boxes capable of preserving the temperature of food, I would be most grateful.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_001_002<tab>Les Sharlayanais ont tendance à privilégier l'apport nutritionnel des aliments plutôt que leur goût, mais il semble que de plus en plus de gens commencent à s'intéresser à la cuisine d'autres contrées grâce aux étudiants en échange. En tout cas, le plus important est que nos boîtes à déjeuner réussissent à conserver la température idéale du repas qu'elles contiennent.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_001_003<tab>Mammets are an invaluable tool for helping students to gauge their command over aetherial manipulation, and it is paramount that the mammet be highly conductive to aether for clear results. The materials used to make them, from the core to the smallest details like the mammet's clothing, must be equally conductive to aether.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_001_003<tab>Une poupée magique est un mannequin d'en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment qui reçoit les ordres de celui qui la manie et les transforme en action... Ce qui veut dire que plus sa sensibilité est élevée, meilleures sont ses performances. Son cœur, ainsi que les vêtements qu'elle porte doivent donc être faits totalement sur-mesure.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_001_004<tab>The regions hit worst by the Final Days are in dire need of school supplies, and I've a mind to send what provisions I can. Items with a long shelf life are preferred, but every little thing helps.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_001_004<tab>Les régions touchées par l'apocalypse ont besoin d'aide pour rétablir un environnement éducatif sûr, et je souhaite donc envoyer des fournitures scolaires solides aux enfants dont l'école a été détruite.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_002_000<tab>When writing the particulars of a spell or ritual on parchment, much like ink, a quill highly conductive to aether will provide the best results. As feathers are the key component, I'd be happy to ascertain the aetheroconductivity of any you have on hand.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_002_000<tab>Pour recopier les sorts et autres formules, il est préférable que l'encre soit fortement chargée en énergie éthérée, mais pas seulement. La plume, elle aussi, doit être hautement éthéroconductrice. Je suis donc très curieuse de voir celles que vous m'avez rapportées<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_002_001<tab>As you undoubtedly already know, crystals are the primary catalyst of magical fociーand the purer the crystal, the greater its potency. Procuring such quality of crystal, however, is no trifling task...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_002_001<tab>Cela va sans dire, mais plus les cristaux utilisés sont purs, meilleures sont les performances du catalyseur. Cependant, il est très difficile de se les procurer, vous vous en doutez.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_002_002<tab>I find that people engrossed in their work have a tendency to forget to eat when they shouldーand students are no exception. That is why I wish to provide them with aetherothermal lunch boxes, capable of keeping food fresh for hours on end. Any materials with insulative properties you have at hand are welcome.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_002_002<tab>Les matériaux utilisés pour les boîtes à déjeuner doivent être par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment isothermes afin de conserver au mieux la température et la fraîcheur des aliments. Et puis bien sûr, meilleure est la qualité des ressources utilisées dans la fabrication, mieux c'est.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_002_003<tab>Mammets require a healthy supply of lubricating oils to keep their joints in good order. Not just any lubricant will do, howeverーthe more impurities in the oil, the less responsive it will be to aetherial manipulation.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_002_003<tab>Les poupées magiques possèdent de nombreuses ar<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>tions, il faut donc les entretenir ré<var 16 /var>gu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>re<var 16 /var>ment avec du lubrifiant. Néanmoins, plus celui-ci contient d'impuretés, plus la magie a du mal à traverser cor<var 16 /var>rec<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment le mannequin. Ce serait donc formidable si vous pouviez me fournir de l'huile de très bonne qualité<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_002_004<tab>The regions hit worst by the Final Days are in dire need of school supplies, and I would provide aid in whatever small way I can. To that end, I would like highly durable materials capable of being used in any environment.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_002_004<tab>Les régions touchées par l'apocalypse ont besoin de matériel pour restaurer leur environnement éducatif dans les meilleures conditions. Il est donc capital de leur fournir des ressources suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment solides pour résister à tous types de milieux.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_003_000<tab>Writing ink is made from a complex process involving the mixture of a unique solution, from which the resultant precipitate is then extracted. Naturally, the better the ingredients, the better the ink will feel to use.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_003_000<tab>Le processus pour fabriquer les encres d'écriture est n'est pas très compliqué. Il suffit de mélanger les ingrédients dans une solution spéciale, d'en extraire uniquement les composants nécessaires, puis de les traiter... Mais bien entendu, plus la qualité des matériaux est bonne, plus il est agréable d'écrire avec.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_003_001<tab>Toads have a variety of uses, but at the Studium, they are primarily used as familiars. Should you happen upon a particularly shrewd one, it would make for a fine familiar indeed!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_003_001<tab>Les crapauds servent à tout un tas de choses, mais à l'académie de magie, beaucoup sont ceux qui en font leur familier. Je suis sûre que des crapauds vifs et fougueux feront le bonheur des étudiants<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_003_002<tab>A beautiful, well-designed lunch box has the subconcious effect of increasing one's appetite, would you not agree? Well, most Sharlayans would not. The students, however, would undoubtedly appreciate the gesture!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_003_002<tab>Un repas bien présenté ouvre plus facilement l'appétit, vous ne trouvez pas<var 1D /var>?  Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, peu sont ceux qui partagent cet avis à Sharlayan, mais nos étudiants étrangers ap<var 16 /var>pré<var 16 /var>cie<var 16 /var>ront cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment de belles boîtes à déjeuner<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_003_003<tab>I wonder, were you aware that a mammet's eyes are generally made of a light-emitting material? I shudder to recall the time I caught a pair of such bright little eyes glowering at me in the darknessー'twas a rather traumatizing experience. As for why mammets are constructed in this way, there are a number of purported reasonsーone such being that it allows them to function in environments void of light.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_003_003<tab>Il est de coutume d'utiliser un matériau phosphorescent pour fabriquer les yeux des poupées magiques d'en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment. Il y a de nombreuses raisons à cela, comme par exemple pour qu'elles puissent voir dans le noir... Néanmoins, je dois avouer que je suis toujours un peu nerveuse lorsque j'aperçois du coin de l'œil quelque chose briller dans la pénombre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_003_004<tab>The satrap of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han has graciously offered  his full consent for natural resources from Thavnair to be dispersed worldwide and used in the creation of educational materialsーall to provide aid to other calamity-struck nations. A high-quality coral would surely produce a brilliant chalk color capable of brightening any child's day!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_KNOWLEDGE_AMELIANCE_003_004<tab>Le satrape de Radz-at-Han a également accepté de nous fournir en matériaux provenant de Thavnair, afin de contribuer à la relance de l'éducation un peu partout. Du corail de bonne qualité pourrait faire d'excellentes craies de couleur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_JUDGEMENT_AMELIANCE_000_000<tab>I just knew you wouldn't disappoint, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I am happy to report I have no qualms with the qualityーI'm sure it will suit our purposes just fine!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_JUDGEMENT_AMELIANCE_000_000<tab>Sublime<var 1D /var>! Merci beaucoup <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Je n'ai rien à redire sur la qualité, c'est parfait<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_JUDGEMENT_AMELIANCE_000_001<tab>Oh my, this looks to be of remarkable quality! I cannot thank you enough for going above and beyond like this... I suspect supply may not meet demand when word among the students spreads out about this.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_JUDGEMENT_AMELIANCE_000_001<tab>Oh, superbe<var 1D /var>! Et quelle qualité<var 1D /var>! Je suis certaine que nous allons crouler sous les demandes de la part de tous les étudiants de l'académie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_JUDGEMENT_AMELIANCE_000_002<tab>I...I am at a loss for words. This is simply outstanding! Were students to become used to such excellence, I fear nothing less would ever satisfy them again. Fret not, however, for I shall make pains to carefully express just how special this is to them.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_JUDGEMENT_AMELIANCE_000_002<tab>Je... je ne sais pas quoi dire. Quelle qualité ex<var 16 /var>cep<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>nelle<var 1D /var>! Comment vais-je faire pour me contenter d'autre chose à partir de maintenant...<var 1D /var>? Soyez sûr<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> que je m'assurerai de bien faire comprendre à nos étudiants en échange la valeur de ce que vous leur avez fabriqué<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_JUDGEMENT_AMELIANCE_000_003<tab>Ah, this is perfect! A mammet as sensitive to aether as this is sure to be highly responsive to the delicacy and precision demanded by healing magicks.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_JUDGEMENT_AMELIANCE_000_003<tab>Oh, c'est exactement ce qu'il fallait pour les poupées d'en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment magiques<var 1D /var>! Je suis certaine qu'avec cela, elles seront totalement réceptives à la délicate magie qu'est la magie curative.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_JUDGEMENT_AMELIANCE_000_004<tab>I cannot say how many more children may now have a brighter future, but know that your efforts have made a difference. I only hope that we can yet reach more young souls, that all can one day have the opportunity to learn...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_JUDGEMENT_AMELIANCE_000_004<tab>Grâce à vous, beaucoup de petits en difficulté vont pouvoir retourner à l'école. J'aimerais tellement que tous les enfants du monde aient une chance égale d'apprendre...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_FULLBAG_000_000<tab>Unable to obtain your reward. Your inventory is full.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_FULLBAG_000_000<tab>Impossible d'obtenir la récompense de changement de rang. Votre inventaire est plein.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_FULLBAG_000_001<tab>To collect your reward, make room in your inventory and speak with Ameliance once more.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_FULLBAG_000_001<tab>Reparlez à Ameliance lorsque vous aurez fait assez de place.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_000_000<tab>Perfect, this is more than enough for now. You've been such an amazing help, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I cannot think of anyone I'd rather have at my side! Thank you. Truly.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_000_000<tab>J'ai tellement bien fait de vous demander de nous aider, personne n'aurait pu mieux faire que vous<var 1D /var>! Merci, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, c'est tout ce dont nous avons besoin pour le moment.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_000_001<tab>Now, I suspect most children are unaware that the legendary Warrior of Light also makes for a splendid artisanーwould you not agree? I daresay this must be rectifiedーdo forgive me if I boast the tiniest bit about you in my next letter to them.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_000_001<tab>Quelque chose me dit que mes enfants ne connaissent pas vraiment votre côté artisan<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? Peut-être devrais-je leur écrire pour me vanter d'en savoir plus sur vous qu'eux, hi hi.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_000<tab>The magical foci you delivered have been a smashing success among the students! Goodness, even my former mentor saw fit to shower me with praiseーthough, rest assured, I told him it was all thanks to you.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_000<tab>Le matériel de magie que vous nous avez fourni a été très bien accueilli<var 1D /var>! J'ai même reçu des compliments d'un de mes anciens professeurs de lorsque j'étais étudiante. Évidemment, je lui ai bien dit que c'était grâce à vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_001<tab>I just hope they can be of use to Mila as well. She seems to have some familiarity with magicks, so I've no doubt she could improve rapidly─were she able to get a solid feel for the basics. Unfortunately, this is one of those things she must come to terms with on her own, while I can only stand back and watch, desperate to help...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_001<tab>J'espère que cela pourra aider Mila, en tout cas. Une fois qu'elle aura pris le coup de main, elle devrait pouvoir progresser rapidement... Mais tout dépend d'elle, donc je dois avouer que c'est un peu frustrant.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I have the most wonderful news! Thanks to your efforts, the students' concerns about the cafeteria food appear to be dwindling!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_000<tab>Parfait<var 1D /var>! Grâce à vous, les étudiants en échange n'auront plus à s'inquiéter du goût des repas de la cafétéria<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_001<tab>I'm reminded of Alphinaud and Alisaie in their school daysーAlisaie would regularly ask me to prepare lunch for her, while Alphinaud was quite happy to sate his appetite with Archon loaf on a daily basis. ...Between you and I, he and his father are alike in just the <var 1A 02 /var>oddest<var 1A 01 /var> ways.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_001<tab>Vous savez, Alisaie me demandait souvent de lui préparer son déjeuner, mais Alphinaud préférait la plupart du temps se contenter de sagepain... Exactement comme son père...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You are dependable to a fault, my dear. Or, perhaps, as a family, we've come to rely on you too much? Fret not, however, as I believe there is a solutionーand a long overdue one at that: we should simply adopt you into the family!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_000<tab>On peut vraiment compter sur vous, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Notre famille en profiterait-elle un peu trop...<var 1D /var>? Hi hi, au point où nous en sommes, nous aurions plus vite fait de vous adopter directement<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_001<tab>...I jest, I jest. In truth, the day where Mila must return home quickly approaches, and I can't help but feel increasingly lonesome at the thought...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_BEFRANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_001<tab>Enfin bref, trêve de boutades. Le jour du départ de Mila approche à grands pas... C'est triste, mais c'est ainsi.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_001<tab>I'm hooome!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_001<tab>Je suis rentrée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_002<tab>Ah, Mila! How was your first day of classes? Were you able to make any friends?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_002<tab>Ah, Mila<var 1D /var>! Comment s'est passée ta première journée<var 1D /var>? Tu t'es fait des amis<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_003<tab>I was! Oh, it was so much fun! Everyone was so wonderfully kind and accepting. Everything felt so different and new, completely unlike any experiences I've had before!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_003<tab>C'était vraiment génial<var 1D /var>! Tout le monde a été très gentil avec moi, et tout est si nouveau... C'est exaltant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_004<tab>That is reassuring to hear. And I must say, you wear the uniform quite well.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_004<tab>Ah, je suis contente de te l'entendre dire<var 1D /var>! Et puis, l'uniforme te va très bien.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_005<tab>Heh heh, thank you! I promise you, I will repay your kindness and convince my mother to accept the path that I've chosen by mastering spellcraft ere I return home!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_005<tab>Hé hé, merci beaucoup<var 1D /var>! Et pour vous prouver ma gratitude et obtenir l'approbation de ma mère, je promets de faire de mon mieux pour maîtriser la magie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_006<tab>Convince...your mother?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_006<tab>L'approbation de ta maman<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_007<tab>For generations, my family has carried on the tradition of alchemyーand, prior to me, each generation poured their hearts and souls into the creation of medicine.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_007<tab>Je descends de plusieurs générations d'alchimistes, et ma famille est spécialisée dans le raffinage de médicaments et remèdes...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_008<tab>But the Final Days changed everything. I saw firsthand that there are countless lives not even the most advanced medicine can save...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_008<tab>Mais depuis l'apocalypse... quelque chose a changé en moi. J'ai été confrontée à nombre de situations où les remèdes n'ont pas suffi à sauver la vie de blessés.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_009<tab>That's why I decided to learn healing magicks, and why I made my way to Sharlayan. My mother was completely against it, but my father was supportive and bid me goーso I took my chances and left.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_009<tab>C'est pour ça que je suis venue à Sharlayan, pour étudier la magie curative. La vérité, c'est que ma mère s'y est violemment opposée... Mais mon père a fini par me donner sa permission, c'est grâce à lui que je suis ici.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_010<tab>I see... Yet, even if the practice of alchemy has long been a family tradition, I see no reason why your mother should be so vehemently opposed to you studying spellcraft. Do you know why she is?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_010<tab>Je n'en avais aucune idée... Pourquoi ta maman était-elle contre ton vœu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_011<tab>I'm not entirely sure, but...the tradition of alchemy has long been a source of pride for my family, and studying spellcraft may be perceived as me rejecting my lineage.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_011<tab>Je pense... qu'elle est très fière de ce que notre famille a accompli en alchimie. Et elle a sûrement l'impression que je les renie en choisissant d'étudier la magie.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_012<tab>I am extremely proud of my family's legacy and contributions to alchemy. But if rejecting tradition means saving more lives, I will gladly make that decision. No matter what it takes, I will return home after, and <var 1A 02 /var>only<var 1A 01 /var> after I've mastered the curative arts!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_012<tab>Mais elle se trompe<var 1D /var>! Simplement, si je peux trouver un moyen de réussir à sauver des vies là où nos médicaments ont échoué, n'est-ce pas le plus important<var 1D /var>? C'est pourquoi je veux absolument apprendre la magie curative<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_013<tab>Yet, with all that said, I hardly know left from right when it comes to spellcraft, as I've only just begun learning. I'm surprised the Studium even accepted my application for study abroad in the first place.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_013<tab>Ceci dit... Je n'ai jamais utilisé la magie, et je n'en ai même pas les bases. Je dois vous avouer que je ne m'attendais même pas à être acceptée en échange ici.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_014<tab>Thank you for sharing your story with us, Mila. Know that you have our full support, and that for our part, we will endeavor to make this experience a fulfilling one.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_014<tab>Merci pour ton honnêteté, Mila. Sache que je suis là pour t'aider si tu en as besoin, et que je serais ravie de te soutenir dans tes efforts<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_015<tab>You are too kind, Lady Ameliance! As a beginner, I know I have a lot of ground to make up, but I refuse to remain stuck behind my peers. I'm gonna give it my all!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_001_015<tab>Oh, merci beaucoup<var 1D /var>! Je promets de faire de mon mieux pour rattraper mon retard<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_001<tab>Why hello there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I didn't realize you were in the neighborhood.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_001<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Bonsoir)) ((Bonjour)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Bonjour)) ((Bonsoir)) /var>)) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_002<tab>I heard you were the gracious soul who's been procuring all sorts of things for myself and the other students─and while I don't know what we did to deserve such kindness, I want you to know that your support means a lot to us. So...thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_002<tab>J'ai appris que c'était vous qui aviez fabriqué le matériel magique pour nous autres étudiants étrangers<var 1D /var>! Merci beaucoup<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_003<tab>Well then, I'd better be offーa lot of spells to practice, and so little time. Can't drag my feet lest I get left behind my peers, after all!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_003<tab>Bien, je dois aller m'entraîner, alors je vous dis à bientôt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_004<tab>Ah, just a moment, Mila!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_004<tab>Ah, Mila attends<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_005<tab>I couldn't help but notice that you seem a touch less cheerful than usual... Pray tell, is something the matter?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_005<tab>Tu m'as l'air un peu moins en forme que d'habitude... Tout va bien<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_006<tab>Wh-What do you mean? I'm actually feeling better than usual, all thanks to how well everyone's been treating me!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_006<tab>V-vraiment<var 1D /var>? Pourtant je vais par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment bien<var 1D /var>! Tout le monde est si gentil ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_007<tab>...Are you sure? The gauntness of your cheeks indicates otherwise.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_007<tab>C'est juste que tu m'as l'air d'avoir un peu maigri, ces derniers temps...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_008<tab>As best as I can tell, you've been enjoying the meals here at home with a healthy appetite, but I cannot speak for elsewhere... How have meals at the Studium been?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_008<tab>Je sais que tu manges cor<var 16 /var>rec<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment lorsque tu es à la maison, mais... es-tu sûre que tu fais de même à l'académie<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_009<tab>U-Um...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_009<tab>Hu-hum...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_010<tab>Aha! As I thought. Believe it or not, meals at the Studium cafeteria were considered <var 1A 02 /var>gruesome<var 1A 01 /var>ーto put it lightlyーeven in the days when I attended. And as a Sharlayan, that's saying something.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_010<tab>Je m'en doutais... La nourriture de la cafétéria était déjà infecte lorsque j'y étais étudiante... Il semblerait que les choses n'aient pas vraiment changé.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_011<tab>Pray forgive me for not noticing sooner, my dear. From now on, I will prepare a lunch for you!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_011<tab>Je suis désolée Mila, je n'y avais pas pensé... Je te préparerai ton déjeuner à emporter à partir de maintenant, d'accord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_012<tab>Wh-What?! No, no, I couldn't bear to inconvenience you any further than I already am!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_012<tab>Qu-quoi<var 1D /var>!? Oh non, ne vous donnez pas plus de mal que vous ne le faites déjà pour moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_013<tab>Please, you are family. Inconvenience? 'Tis nothing of the sort.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_013<tab>Ne t'inquiète pas pour cela, nous sommes une famille<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_014<tab>Right then! I would love to learn how to cook some Thavnairian dishes, if you would be my teacher? Come, let us be off to the kitchen!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_014<tab>Je sais<var 1D /var>! Que dirais-tu de m'enseigner la cuisine thavnairoise<var 1D /var>? Nous pourrions mijoter de bons petits plats ensemble<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MERYLD_002_015<tab>L-Lady Ameliance! We servants would be happy to serve anything you wishーpray leave the cooking to us!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MERYLD_002_015<tab>Dame Ameliance<var 1D /var>! Laissez-nous nous en charger, c'est notre travail<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_016<tab>Thank you, Meryld, but that won't be necessaryーI do have <var 1A 02 /var>some<var 1A 01 /var> experience in the kitchen. In our school days, I would oft prepare a lunch box for Fourchenaultーmalnutrition may have claimed his life had I not, taken with Archon's loaf as he was.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_016<tab>Ne t'inquiète pas Meryld<var 1D /var>! J'avais l'habitude de préparer les déjeuners de Fourchenault pour éviter qu'il ne se nourrisse exclusivement de sagepain, tu sais.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_017<tab>Nowーlet us cook up a storm, shall we Mila?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_017<tab>Allez. Viens, Mila. Commençons dès maintenant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_018<tab>Y-Yes!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_002_018<tab>D-d'accord<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MERYLD_002_019<tab>B-But! Lady Ameliance, p-please reconsider!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MERYLD_002_019<tab>Dame Ameliance...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_000<tab>Perfect timing as always, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. There is a matter I wish to discuss with you.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_000<tab>Ah, au fait. Je voulais vous demander conseil concernant Mila.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_001<tab>It is about Mila...I fear she may be having difficulty gaining a proper grasp on spellcraft.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_001<tab>Il semblerait... qu'elle ait du mal à faire des progrès dans l'ap<var 16 /var>pren<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>sage de la magie...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_002<tab>'Tis a complex art that cannot be learned in a short amount of timeーnor can it be learned through pure effort. No, there must be a knack for it.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_002<tab>Bien sûr, c'est un art qui ne s'assimile pas en une journée... Et certains auront beau s'entraîner jusqu'à l'épuisement, s'ils n'ont pas la bonne sensibilité, ils n'y arriveront jamais.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_003<tab>Fortunately, I believe Mila has this knack. Furthermore, she appears to understand the theory behind magick, and possesses a strong desire to succeed.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_003<tab>Mais Mila en a les capacités, j'en suis certaine. De plus, elle comprend par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment la théorie et a très envie d'apprendre.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_004<tab>However, it is the latter quality in particular which worries me... With each day that passes, she returns home later and later.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_004<tab>C'est pour cela que je suis inquiète de la voir rentrer de plus en plus tard chaque jour...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_005<tab>Lest you wonder, she always sends word in advanceーever considerate of others, that one. If only she would shift some of that consideration to her own wellbeing... Even today she notified me that she would be studying on campus until late.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_005<tab>Bien sûr, elle me prévient chaque fois qu'elle a du retard<var 1D /var>! Aujourd'hui encore, elle m'a dit qu'elle resterait s'entraîner à l'académie après la fin des cours...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_006<tab>I understand her desire to prove herself, but what kind of personーno, motherーwould I be if I stood by and watched as she works herself to the point of collapse? I must talk with her face to face before she injures herself.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_006<tab>Mais j'ai peur qu'elle ne soit en train de se surmener... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Nous devons l'empêcher de défaillir de fatigue<var 1D /var>! Allons la chercher<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_007<tab>You may think me overprotective, but I consider this my duty...as a mother, and as a friend.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_007<tab>Je sais ce que vous vous dites... Je m'inquiète trop... Mais je suis responsable d'elle pendant son séjour à Sharlayan, et c'est mon rôle de veiller à son bien-être.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_008<tab>...Ahem, that said, the Studium is rather large, is it not? I would be eternally grateful if you would accompany me while I look for her, if it is not too much to ask?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_008<tab>Mais... l'académie de magie est immense... Cela m'aiderait beaucoup si vous acceptiez de venir avec moi.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_009<tab>You are too kind! Just say the word when you are ready to departーI am ready to leave at a moment's notice.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_003_009<tab>Mille mercis<var 1D /var>! Revenez me parler lorsque vous serez prêt<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à partir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_000<tab>Lady Ameliance, Meryld, and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Though my time here in Sharlayan was short, full glad am I that I was able to spend it with you. There are no words with which I can adequately express my immense gratitude.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_000<tab>Madame Ameliance, Meryld, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Merci beaucoup pour tout ce que vous avez fait pour moi pendant mon séjour à Sharlayan.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_001<tab>My, how the time fliesーit feels as though you walked through the front door just yesterday... I will miss you dearly, Mila, but I know from experience how your parents must be feeling.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_001<tab>C'est passé tellement vite... Je suis triste de te voir partir, Mila, mais tes parents doivent attendre ton retour avec impatience.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_002<tab>I know I have said it many times, but please let me say it once more: thank youーfrom the bottom of my heart. If not for your support, countless students never would've been able to study abroadーmyself included. We owe you a great debt of gratitude for everything you've done for us.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_002<tab>Merci pour tout, vraiment. De nombreux étudiants en échange, moi comprise, n'auraient pas pu profiter de cette expérience sans votre aide.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_003<tab>I don't even want to imagine how my studies would've turned out had it not been for the amazing resources <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and my lovely host family prepared...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_003<tab>Sans l'accueil de la famille Leveilleur et les précieuses ressources que vous nous avez fournies, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, jamais je n'aurais tenu...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_004<tab>While I don't quite having something to offer as thanks, I do have something to show you.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_004<tab>Pour vous prouver ma gratitude, j'aimerais vous montrer quelque chose, à tou<var 08 E905 ((tes)) ((s)) /var> les deux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_005<tab>Here I go...!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_005<tab>Regardez ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_104_005<tab>(Now fall, just like in practice...!)
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_104_005<tab>Allonge-toi sur le dos, maintenant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_006<tab>That was amazing! You had perfect control over it!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_006<tab>Fantastique<var 1D /var>! Tu arrives par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment à la contrôler<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_007<tab>Oh, I'm just getting started...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_007<tab>Et ce n'est pas tout<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_008<tab>Mila...! Howー<var 1A 02 /var>when<var 1A 01 /var> did you learn to wield healing magicks?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_008<tab>Mila... Tu appris à maîtriser la magie curative<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_009<tab>Ah, but that is beside the point. This is the fruit borne of your hard workーand I could not be prouder of you!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_009<tab>Oh, je suis tellement fière de toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_010<tab>Heh heh. thank you! But I didn't make it this far by myself. I have <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> to thank for crafting countless spectacular mammets, the professors at the Studium for their instruction, and you most of all for your advice, and for always believing in me, Lady Ameliance!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_010<tab>Hé hé hé, merci beaucoup<var 1D /var>! C'est grâce à la poupée fabriquée par <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, aux professeurs, et bien sûr à votre aide, Madame Ameliance<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_011<tab>There is something you should know. ...I've decided to pursue alchemy when I return home.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_011<tab>Je voulais également vous annoncer que j'ai décidé de suivre la formation pour devenir alchimiste à mon retour à Thavnair.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_012<tab>By studying the art of spellcraft, I feel that I've come to understand the advantages and disadvantages inherent between the two disciplines.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_012<tab>Étudier à l'académie m'a permis de bien comprendre les différences entre la magie et l'alchimie, ainsi que les avantages et inconvénients de chaque discipline.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_013<tab>It was when I first made this realization that an idea sprung to mindーwhat if I were to master <var 1A 02 /var>both<var 1A 01 /var> disciplines? I could compensate for the weaknesses of one with the strengths of the other, and help even more people that way!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_013<tab>Si je réussis à maîtriser les deux, je pourrai donc en combiner les forces et en compenser les faiblesses<var 1D /var>! C'est une bonne idée, pas vrai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_014<tab>So, I guess what I'm trying to say is...once I finish my training with alchemy, I <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> return to these shores! This, I promise you, Lady Ameliance!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_014<tab>Alors... Madame Ameliance, je vous promets de revenir vous voir à Vieille Sharlayan une fois ma formation d'alchimiste terminée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_015<tab>When that day comes, may I come see you again?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_015<tab>Lorsque cela arrivera... Je pourrai venir vous voir<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_016<tab>Oh, Mila! You hardly need ask! It's a promiseーso don't keep me waiting too long, okay?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_016<tab>Oh, Mila<var 1D /var>! Mais bien entendu<var 1D /var>! J'attendrai ta visite avec impatience<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_017<tab>Ah, there was just one other matter. Everyone in the household came together to prepare a parting gift for youーI do hope you'll like it.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_017<tab>Et puis, j'aimerais te remettre un petit cadeau, de la part de toute la famille Leveilleur.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_018<tab>Oh my gosh, these clothes...they're so beautiful I could cry! But I mustn't or I'll ruin them! Thank you, thank you, thank you everyone!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_018<tab>Ouah... Quelle magnifique tenue<var 1D /var>! Je l'adore, merci beaucoup<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_019<tab>As a master artisan, what do you think, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Do they suit me?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_019<tab>Qu'en pensez-vous<var 1D /var>? Ça me va bien<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_020<tab>I am thrilledーif not a touch relievedーthat you've taken a liking to them. As we went about designing and weaving your new vestments, we carried hope in our hearts that your future would be the bright one you deserve.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_020<tab>Je suis très contente de voir que cela te plaît<var 1D /var>! Nous souhaitons que ton futur soit aussi brillant que ces vêtements<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_021<tab>I will treasure itーall of it. These lovely clothes, my experience here, everyone I met...all of it, I will treasure forever.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_021<tab>J'en prendrai grand soin, vous pouvez en être certaine<var 1D /var>! Et je chérirai les souvenirs de mon temps passé à Sharlayan pour toujours<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MERYLD_004_022<tab>Miss Miladeen, I'm afraid the time of your ship's departure draws near. We had best be setting off.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MERYLD_004_022<tab>Mademoiselle Miladeen, il est l'heure.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_023<tab>Oh... I knew this moment would come, but even so I'm not prepared to the say the words. And after receiving a gift as lovely and thoughtful as this... <sniff>
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_023<tab>Ah... C'est encore plus difficile de vous dire au revoir après avoir reçu un si beau cadeau...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_024<tab>Everyone, I...I love you all so much! Thank you a million times over for everything!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_024<tab>Je... je vous aime tous très fort. Merci... Merci beaucoup...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_025<tab>We love you too, Mila. Safe travels, and know that we will always be thinking of you. May your journey in life be one full of smiles and laughterーthe selfsame gift you brought to all of us.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_025<tab>Et nous t'aimons également, chère Mila. Bon voyage. Et je te souhaite une vie pleine de joie.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_026<tab>I'll do my best! Until we meet again!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_MILADEEN_004_026<tab>À vous également<var 1D /var>! À bientôt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_100<tab>There must be other students from abroad who, just like Mila, are coming to terms with wielding spellcraft for the first time.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_100<tab>Je pense que Mila n'est pas la seule à apprendre la magie pour la première fois parmi les étudiants étrangers.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_101<tab>And so I come to you with a proposition: I would like you to procure magical foci and toads to assist students in wielding magicks. The better the quality, the more quickly students will be able to master the basics. What do you say?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_101<tab>Voilà pourquoi j'aimerais leur fournir du matériel magique de base pour les aider dans leur ap<var 16 /var>pren<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>sage. Quelque chose de bonne qualité, qui leur permettra de s'améliorer rapidement.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_102<tab>I knew I could rely on you! Thank you as always, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_001_102<tab>Vraiment<var 1D /var>? Fantastique, merci beaucoup<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_100<tab><sigh> If only I'd noticed sooner, she wouldn't have had to suffer so. Even in the best of circumstances, 'tis not uncommon for one to miss the nostalgic taste of homeーbut to be faced with Sharlayan cuisine of all things...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_100<tab>Ah, si seulement je m'en étais rendue compte plus tôt<var 1D /var>! Déjà que les plats de sa région doivent lui manquer... Alors si en plus on lui sert de la cuisine sharlayanaise...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_101<tab>It breaks my heart to think that there may be other students suffering in silence just as Mila was. I will caution the other host families to be particularly mindful when it comes to matters of nourishment, just to be safe.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_101<tab>Je suis sûre que Mila n'est pas la seule à en souffrir... Je vais prévenir les autres familles d'accueil de faire attention à bien leur préparer de bons repas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_102<tab>On a related note, I wish to ask a favor of you. Passionate students such as Mila are like as not to be out studying from the first class in the morning till well after the last bell, soーif you can spare the timeーI would like you to prepare aetherothermal lunch boxes capable of preserving food for hours on end.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_002_102<tab>J'aimerais également vous demander de me fabriquer quelques boîtes à déjeuner magiques... Idéalement, il faudrait qu'elles soient capables de garder les aliments frais et à la bonne température, et ce même pendant plusieurs heures.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_100<tab>It never gets easier to watch them walk away. No matter how many times I experience it.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_100<tab>Je ne m'habituerai jamais aux au revoir, je crois...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_101<tab>But I should not burden you with such musingsーcertainly not when I have good news to share! Several host families have informed me that the students in their care were able to enjoy their stay in Sharlayan and return home safelyーand we owe it all to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_101<tab>Les autres familles d'accueil m'ont dit que leurs étudiants étaient bien repartis, eux aussi, après avoir brillé pendant leur cursus. C'est grâce à vous, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_102<tab>Our success here has inspired me to expand my support activities beyond Sharlayan's bordersーthere must be more that I can do to give even more children the opportunity to learn, I just know it.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_102<tab>Le succès de ce programme d'échange m'encourage à continuer dans cette voie. Pas seulement en faisant venir des étudiants en échange à Vieille Sharlayan, mais également en soutenant les élèves en difficulté dans d'autres contrées.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_103<tab>That is not to say I will not be accepting more students for homestayーfar from it!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_103<tab>Bien entendu, j'ai également pour projet d'accueillir d'autres jeunes chez moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_104<tab>Just imagine the look on Fourchenault and the twins' faces when they return home only to find a complete stranger living hereーyes, I do think I will keep this program a secret for some time longer.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_104<tab>Mon mari et mes enfants risquent d'être surpris de tomber face à face avec eux lorsqu'ils rentreront... Je crois que je vais garder le secret jusqu'à leur retour, hi hi.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_105<tab>Ah, and before I forget, I have a little something for youーdo you recall the outfit we made for Mila? We were actually in the midst of preparing one for you too.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_105<tab>Ah, au fait<var 1D /var>! Je vous ai fait préparer une tenue, à vous aussi.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_106<tab>We ended up preparing hers firstーwhat with her needing to return homeーbut yours is almost ready. I hope you don't mind waiting a few moments longer.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_106<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, il a fallu terminer celle de Mila avant qu'elle ne parte, donc la vôtre n'est pas encore tout à fait prête... Je suis désolée de devoir vous faire patienter, mais je promets que cela en vaudra la peine<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_107<tab>And, while I have you, there was one final matterーsomething I'd like to keep just between us. Should you happen across any apparel that you think might suit me during your travels, do bring them here. If it's something that will make Fourchenault blush, all the better!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_LCUT_RANKUP_AMELIANCE_004_107<tab>Et puis, il y autre chose que j'aimerais que vous gardiez secret... Si vous avez des conseils vestimentaires à me donner, c'est avec plaisir<var 1D /var>! J'ai très envie de surprendre mon mari, hi hi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_000_000<tab>Ameliance is pleased with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Partner to the Leveilleurs<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_000_000<tab>Votre rang de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion a changé. <var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var> vous voit désormais comme un<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> allié<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> aux Leveilleur.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_000_001<tab>Ameliance is delighted with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Benefactor of the Leveilleurs<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_000_001<tab>Votre rang de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion a changé. <var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var> vous voit désormais comme l<var 08 E905 ((a)) ((e)) /var> bienfait<var 08 E905 ((rice)) ((eur)) /var> des Leveilleur.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_000_002<tab>Ameliance is overjoyed with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Champion of the Leveilleurs<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_000_002<tab>Votre rang de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion a changé. <var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var> vous voit désormais comme <var 08 E905 ((l'héroïne)) ((le héros)) /var> des Leveilleur.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_000_003<tab>Ameliance could not be happier with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Member of the Leveilleurs<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_000_003<tab>Votre rang de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion a changé. <var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var> vous voit désormais comme un<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> membre de la famille Leveilleur.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER8_00773_RANKUPINFO_001_001<tab>And yet there is still much work to be done if she is to ensure students from abroad feel at home in Old Sharlayan. To that end, Ameliance has a new favor to ask of you...
